'''Buster Reeves''' (born January 7, 1975) is a British stuntman and actor who served as the stunt coordinator for the first season of [[Game of Thrones (TV series)|''Game of Thrones'']].

He has worked as a stuntman in a number of large Hollywood productions, including ''Troy'', ''War of the Worlds'', ''Batman Begins'', and ''Clash of the Titans''. He has also appeared in uncredited minor roles in ''The Dark Knight'' and ''Terminator: Salvation''.
